Class Blog

public class Blog
extends AbstractBlog

Represents a blog.

Constructor Detail

Blog

public Blog(java.lang.String root)
Creates a new Blog instance, based at the specified location.

Parameters:
root - an absolute path pointing to the root directory of the blog
Method Detail

init

protected void init()
Initialize this blog - prepare it for use. Note: As this blog instance is passed to the various participants while it is being initialized, this method is dependent on the correct order of calls: Keep in mind that 'this' is only partly initialized until the end of this method...

Overrides:
init in class AbstractBlog
